```{r}
mydat<- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/owid/covid-19-data/master/public/data/owid-covid-data.csv')
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
mydat%>%
  select(location,date, total_cases, new_cases, life_expectancy)%>%
  filter(location=="Puerto Rico")%>%
  head(10)%>%
  gt()
```
